entry.title: Proposal: soft-fork to make anyone-can-spend outputs unspendable for 100 blocks
entry.summary: In an email thread dated June 3, 2013, Melvin Carvalho asked why someone would want to sacrifice their Bitcoins. Michael replied to the question and mentioned that one reason for sacrificing Bitcoins is Fidelity Bonds. The email thread does not provide any further details about Fidelity Bonds or how they relate to Bitcoin.
